name: Katheryne
title: Katheryne, Guild Receptionist
desc: "Ad astra abyssosque! Welcome to the Adventurers' Guild."

attributes.source: Reward for accepting Lan's Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">When you perform "Switch Character": This switch is considered a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Fast Action instead of a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action. (Once per Round)
